about_the_game:
My Furry Succubus is a story about a guy who finds a mysterious old lamp in his uncle's garage, which turns out to summon a real succubus named Lynn. But unlike a genie, she won't grant you any wishes - she'll ask you for three wishes. To get rid of her, you have to help her have fun - buy new clothes (with YOUR money), watch a soap opera with her, and have dinner at a fancy restaurant.

My Furry Succubus, like all the other "My Furry", is a short kinetic novel about spending time with a lonely soul. Chat with Lynn, spend time with her, help her have fun, and maybe this affair will turn into something serious.

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains partial nudity, sexual themes and dialogue.

name: My Furry Succubus 🐾

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM

short_description: You just found a mysterious old lamp in your uncle's garage. Nothing bad can happen if you rub it, right?...
